data.name: DashPanel - SimBin/Sector3 Studios Full Data
data.detailed_description:
Unlock full data for GTR2, GT Legends, Race07, RaceRoom Racing Experience.

NOTE:
Purchasing Steam DLC gives you access to full data on the Windows version of DashPanel ONLY!!
If you wish to access full data on Android or iOS devices purchase the full data unlocks within the DashPanel application on the desired platform.


Full data supports the following widgets:

GTR2:

•Gear
•Speed
•RPM
•Position
•Laps
•Fuel
•Fuel Bar
•Lap Time
•Last Lap Time
•Best Lap Time
•Clock
•Shift Lights
•Shift Light Module
•Shift Light Pi
•RPM Bar
•RPM Bar Solid
•RPM Gauge
•Speed Gauge
•Fuel Gauge
•Water Temp Gauge
•Oil Temp Gauge
•Multigauge
•Tyre Temp Indicator
•Tyre Temperatures
•Oil Temperature
•Water Temperature
•Background Screen

•Dash Display Modern F1

data.short_description: Unlock full data for GTR2, GT Legends, Race07, RaceRoom Racing Experience. The demo version provides Speed, RPM and Gear purchase this DLC to unlock full data.
data.legal_notice: DashPanel is not official software of SimBin™ and Sector3 Studios™. The names used are for identification purposes only. All trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
